Verses: 1 adhanpinbu Pavul Aththene Pattanaththai Vittu, Korindhu Pattanaththukku Vandhu;

2 yoodharellaarum Romaaburiyai Vittuppogumpadi Kilavudhiyuraayan Kattalaiyittapadiyinaale, Iththaaliyaavilirundhu Pudhidhaai Vandhirundha Pondhudhesaththaanaagiya Aakkillaa Ennum Naamamulla Oru Yoodhanaiyum Avan Manaiviyaagiya Piriskillaavaiyum Ange Kandu, Avargalidaththirkup Ponaan.
3 avargal Koodaarampannugira Thozhilaaligalaayirundhaargal; Thaanum Andhath Thozhil Seygiravanaanapadiyinaale Avargalidaththil Thangi Velaiseydhukonduvandhaan.
4 oivunaal Thorum Avan Jebaaalayaththile Sambaashanaipanni, Yoodharukkum Girekkarukkum Buththisonnaan.
5 makkedhoniyaavilirundhu Seelaavum Theemoththeyum Vandhabodhu, Pavul Aaviyil Vairaakkiyankondu, Yesuve Kiristhu Endru Yoodharukkuth Thirushtaandhappaduththinaan.

6 avargal Edhirththu Nindru Thooshiththabodhu, Avan Than Vasthirangalai Udhari: Ungal Raththappazhi Ungal Thalaiyinmel Irukkum; Naan Suththamaayirukkiren; Idhumudhal Purajaadhiyaaridaththirkup Pogirenendru Avargaludane Solli,
7 avvidaththaivittu, Dhevanai Vanangugiravanaagiya Yusthu Ennum Perulla Oruvanudaiya Veettirku Vandhaan; Avan Veetu Jebaaalayaththirku Aduththadhaayirundhadhu.

8 jebaaalayaththalaivanaagiya Kirispu Enbavan Than Veettaar Anaivarodum Karththaridaththil Visuvaasamullavanaanaan. Korindhiyaril Anegarum Suviseshaththaik Kettu, Visuvaasiththu, Gnaanasnaanam Petraargal.
9 raaththiriyile Karththar Pavulukkuth Dharisanamaagi: Nee Bayappadaamal Pesu, Mavunamaayiraadhe;
10 naan Unnudanekooda Irukkiren, Unakkuth Theenguseyyumpadi Oruvanum Unmel Kaipoduvadhillai; Indhap Pattanaththil Enakku Anega Janangal Undu Endraar.
11 avan Oru Varushamum Aaru Maadhamum Ange Thangi, Dhevavasanaththai Avargalukkulle Ubadhesampannikkonduvandhaan.
12 galliyon Enbavan Agaayaa Naattirku Adhibadhiyaanabodhu, Yoodhargal Orumanappattu, Pavulukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbi, Avanai Niyaayaasanaththukku Munbaagak Kondupoi:
13 ivan Vedhappiramaanaththukku Vigarpamaai Dhevanaich Sevikkumpadi Manusharukkup Podhikkiraan Endraargal.

14 pavul Pesuvadharku Eththanappadugaiyil, Galliyon Yoodharai Nokki: Yoodhargale, Idhu Oru Aniyaayamaai, Alladhu Pollaadha Nadakkaiyaayirukkumeyaanaal Naan Ungalukkup Porumaiyaaich Sevikoduppadhu Niyaayamaayirukkum.

15 idhu Sorkalukkum, Naamangalukkum, Ungal Vedhaththukkum Aduththa Tharkkamaanapadiyinaale, Ippadippattavaigalaikkuriththu Visaaranaiseyya Enakku Manadhillai, Neengale Paarththukkollungal Endru Solli,
16 avargalai Niyaayaasanaththinindru Thuraththivittaan.
17 appozhudhu Girekkarellaarum Jebaaalayaththalaivanaagiya Sosdhenayaip Pidiththu, Niyaayaasanaththukku Munbaaga Adiththaargal. Ivaigalil Ondraiyunkuriththuk Galliyon Kavalaippadavillai

18 pavul Aneganaal Ange Thariththirundhapinbu, Sagodhararidaththil Uththaravu Petrukkondu, Thanakku Oru Piraarththanai Undaayirundhapadiyinaal Kengireyaa Pattanaththil Thalaichchavaram Pannikkondu, Seeriyaadhesaththukkup Pogak Kappal Erinaan. Piriskillaalum Aakkillaavum Avanudane Koodapponaargal.
19 avan Ebesu Pattanaththukku Vandhabodhu, Ange Avargalai Vittu Neengi, Jebaaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Yoodharudane Sambaashanaipanninaan.
20 avan Innunj Silakaalam Thangaludane Irukkavendumendru Avargal Kettukkondabodhu, Avan Sammadhiyaamal,

21 varugira Pandigaiyile Eppadiyaayinum Naan Erusalemil Irukkavendum, Dhevanukkuch Siththamaanaal Thirumbi Ungalidaththirku Varuvenendru Solli, Avargalidaththil Uththaravu Petrukkondu, Kappal Eri, Ebesuvai Vittup Purappattu,
22 sesariyaa Pattanaththukku Vandhu, Erusalemukkup Poi, Sabaiyaich Sandhiththu, Andhiyogiyaavukkup Ponaan.
23 ange Silakaalam Sanjariththapinbu, Purappattu, Kiramamaaik Kalaaththiyaa Naattileyum Pirikiyaa Naattileyum Sutriththirindhu, Seesharellaaraiyum Thidappaduththinaan.
24 appozhudhu Aleksandhiriyaa Pattanaththil Pirandhavanum Saadhuriyavaanum Vedhaagamangalil Vallavanumaana Appollo Ennum Perkonda Oru Yoodhan Ebesu Pattanaththukku Vandhaan.

25 avan Karththarudaiya Maarkkaththile Ubadhesikkappattu, Yovaan Koduththa Snaanaththaimaaththiram Arindhavanaayirundhu, Aaviyil Analullavanaaik Karththarukku Aduththavaigalaith Thittamaaip Podhagampannikkonduvandhaan.

26 avan Jebaaalayaththil Dhairiyamaaip Pesaththodanginabodhu, Aakkillaavum Piriskillaalum Avan Pesugiradhaik Kettu, Avanaich Serththukkondu, Dhevanudaiya Maarkkaththai Adhiga Thittamaai Avanukku Vivariththukkaanbiththaargal.
27 pinbu Avan Agaayaa Naattirkup Pogavendumendrirukkaiyil, Seeshargal Avanai Etrukkollumpadi Sagodharar Avargalukku Ezhudhinaargal.

28 avan Ange Vandhapinbu Veliyarangamaaga Yoodhargaludane Balamaaith Tharkkampanni, Yesuve Kiristhu Endru Vedhavaakkiyangalaikkondu Thirushtaandhappaduththinapadiyaal, Kirubaiyinaale Visuvaasigalaanavargalukku Migavum Udhaviyaayirundhaan.
